intros: ðŸ‘‹ My interests include nanotechnology, fiber optics, and circuit design, but I am open-minded about various fields to pursue in my career. I work well within teams to collaborate on projects.
Since high school I have held positions in retail, education, and the semiconductor industry

sideIntros: I enjoy long hikes in San Antonio. I love to travel with my parents. I also love our dog Charlie.
I am a big foodie and enjoy all different cuisines but I love my moms meals the most!
